function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate natural ventilation may limit the dilution of indoor air and increase the risk of airborne transmission of contagious diseases","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne transmission of contagious diseases and poor indoor air quality","Mitigation":"Ensure proper environmental conditions and building requirements for effective natural ventilation, as well as regular maintenance and monitoring of natural ventilation systems","Technologies":"Building management systems, air quality sensors, and ventilation control systems","People":"Building occupants, especially in poorly ventilated spaces","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Inadequate mechanical ventilation systems may fail to regulate good indoor air quality and control infection transmission","Impact":"Increased risk of indoor infection transmission and poor indoor air quality","Mitigation":"Proper installation and maintenance of mechanical ventilation systems, including regular inspection and cleaning of ventilation components","Technologies":"HVAC systems, exhaust fans, air distribution systems","People":"Building occupants, especially in spaces with mechanical ventilation systems","Owner":"Building owners, HVAC technicians"},{"Description":"Lack of understanding and guidance on ventilation systems in the context of COVID-19 and infectious disease outbreaks","Impact":"Uncertainty and potential mismanagement of ventilation systems, leading to increased risk of infection transmission","Mitigation":"Provide clear guidelines and protocols for the use and maintenance of ventilation systems during disease outbreaks, and promote education on the importance of ventilation in disease control","Technologies":"Information dissemination platforms, educational materials, remote monitoring systems","People":"Building owners, facility managers, public health authorities","Owner":"Public health authorities, government agencies"}]}
